casebody.data:
CONSOLIDATION COAL COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
DIRECTOR, OFFICE OF WORKERS' COMPENSATION PROGRAMS, DEPARTMENT OF LABOR, et al. No. 17-1335. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 3, 2018.

Motion of respondent Robert Thompson for Attorney's fees and expenses granted. The Court approves the parties' agreed upon attorney's fees of $14,732.50, and expenses of $1,152.63, to be paid by Consolidation Coal Co.
